text: Tomadera prati irsanbita haye. Kintu yakhana kono bipada ase takhana tumi tadera dekhate pabe tara tomara dike ceye ache, -- tadera cokha ghurache tara mato ye mrtyura karane murccha geche. Tarapara yakhana bipada cale yaya takhana tara tomadera aghata kare tiksa jihaba diye saubhagyera jan'ya irsanbita haye. Era bisbasa kare ni, sejan'ya allah tadera kirtikalapa biphala karechena. Ara eti to allahâ€Œra jan'ya sahaja.
